Title: Relates to creating a reassessment relief tax credit
Summary: Creates a reassessment relief tax credit that qualified taxpayers can apply for beginning with the first taxable year after the most recent county-wide property reassessment and implementation of a phase-in program authorized by section four hundred eighty-five-u of the real property tax law pertaining to the class one reassessment exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating a reassessment relief tax credit
